articles.description: PETE JENSON: Barcelona members voted in favour of the club selling off part of its retail arm Barcelona Licensing and Merchandising (BLM), and part of its future TV rights revenue.
articles.content: Barcelona members voted in favour of the club selling off part of its retail arm Barcelona Licensing and Merchandising (BLM), and part of its future TV rights revenue, so they can sign players this s… [+3443 chars]

articles.author: David Coverdale
articles.title: Transgender cyclist Emily Bridges faces being blocked from major events for another TWO years - Daily Mail
articles.description: DAVID COVERDALE: On Thursday the UCI updated their transgender policy, lowering the maximum testosterone level to 2.5 nmol/L and increasing the transition period to 24 months.
articles.content:
British transgender rider Emily Bridges faces being blocked from major events for at least another two years after cyclings world governing body announced new, stricter rules.
